author: fabferro
body:
#### PR description:
As requested in issue #31061, this PR migrates to esConsumes the following packages:
CalibPPS and Dqm/CTPPS 

#### PR validation:
Private checks have been done showing no changes in reconstruction, simulation and DQM plots of PPS.

No backport needed.

@jan-kaspar
title: Migrate part of PPS modules to use esConsumes
